QuestionDef.QText: Grantee has approved human subjects assurance?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: Grantee must have assurance even if all research involving human subjects is conducted at other performance sites. If No, award will be held for assurance and IRB approval.)

QuestionDef.QInstructions: http://www.hhs.gov/ohrp/assurances/assurances_index.html

Does performance site(s) have approved assurance(s)?

QuestionDef.QText: Is the project viable if the site(s) does not receive assurance?
